meanings.sent1: She decided to russify her wardrobe by adding traditional Russian patterns to her clothes.
meanings.sent2: The immigrant community started to russify over time, embracing Russian traditions and values.
meanings.sent3: In an attempt to russify his cooking, he added dill to every dish he made.
meanings.sent4: The small town was slowly russifying, with more people speaking Russian and celebrating Russian holidays.
meanings.sent5: The old house was russified with the addition of colorful onion domes on the roof.
